response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am offering it to you today at a special price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value, providing you with a substantial benefit. I believe this is an exceptional deal that will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
